creator: rhendrix@baldor.com
text:
I downloaded the new tomcat 5.5.30 beta and attempted to build it on my system.
 I get the following error.  Please advise.

balweb15:/srv/apps # cd tomcat-5.5.30/
balweb15:/srv/apps/tomcat-5.5.30 # ls -la
total 9
drwxr-xr-x   7 root root  280 Oct 11 16:28 .
drwxr-xr-x   6 root root  216 Oct 11 16:29 ..
-rw-r--r--   1 root root 4218 Nov 24  2004 build.xml
drwxr-xr-x   4 root root   96 Nov 24  2004 jakarta-servletapi-5
drwxr-xr-x   3 root root  424 Oct 11 16:28 jakarta-tomcat-5
drwxr-xr-x   7 root root  248 Oct 11 16:28 jakarta-tomcat-catalina
drwxr-xr-x  11 root root  480 Oct 11 16:28 jakarta-tomcat-connectors
drwxr-xr-x   3 root root   72 Nov 24  2004 jakarta-tomcat-jasper
balweb15:/srv/apps/tomcat-5.5.30 # ant

balweb15:/srv/apps/tomcat-5.5.30 #

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
5.0.30 is almost 2 years old so some of the download locations have changed. The
one you want is:
http://switch.dl.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/mx4j/mx4j-1.1.1.tar.gz

I am marking this as WONTFIX given that a new 5.0.x release is very unlikely.
